titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on certain cathode-ray tubes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/10/2002--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 2007, the suspension of duty on cathode-ray data/graphic display tubes, color, with a less than 90 degree deflection.
